text: Bogdan Ionuț Miron (born 2 January 1982) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Liga III side Aerostar Bacău. He made his Liga I debut in a 0–0 draw away to Politehnica Timișoara in September 2009, a performance for which he was named man of the match. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Bacău Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Petrolul Ploiești players Category:CSM Jiul Petroșani players Category:FC Astra Giurgiu players Category:CSU Voința Sibiu players Category:CSM Ceahlăul Piatra Neamț players Category:FC Politehnica Iași (2010) players Category:FCM Dunărea Galați players Category:CS Aerostar Bacău players
title: Bogdan Ionuț Miron
